Test Steps.Step Action: Verify new changes on Add/Maintain office. On SEARCH office screen\n Office will display "District Type" instead of Office Type and \nDistrict Type as "District"
Test Steps.Step Expected: New display fields \nDistrict Type\nDistrict

Test Steps.Step Action: The display result grid should display the District Type next to Office name field and the Single County Office field should be removed from the search results column
Test Steps.Step Expected: "Office Type" should be renamed "District Type" and moved \n Remove "Single County Office"

Test Steps.Step Action:
Regression Test
Add Office: 
Click on Election Management and select OFFICES from the dropdown
Click On ADD button
Provide the required fields and click on SAVE
A new Office is added
Test Steps.Step Expected: User successfully creates a new office when provides all the required fields and Saves. This office is displayed in the list below on the Search office screen.

Test Steps.Step Action:
Regression Test
Maintain Office:
Search Office by providing either the name or District Type or District fields and click on Action Items and select EDIT rename the office or change the district type or District and click on Save button
Test Steps.Step Expected: User successfully updates the office.

Test Steps.Step Action:
Pre-requisites:
1. Have an existing Office that is not assigned to anything
2. Have an existing Non-Election-Template Office that is assigned to an Election
3. Have an existing Office that is assigned to an Election Template that an Election uses
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n

Test Steps.Step Action: Access the EMS system\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: Dashboard displayed\n

Test Steps.Step Action: Navigate to Election Management > Offices > Search
Test Steps.Step Expected: Office Search page is displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Find the existing Office that is not assigned to anything and click on the "Actions" ellipsis
Test Steps.Step Expected: Options displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Click "Delete"
Test Steps.Step Expected: A pop-up box will be displayed asking the user if they are sure they want to delete the Office

Test Steps.Step Action: Click "Cancel"
Test Steps.Step Expected: The pop-up box will be removed and nothing will happen

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on the "Actions" ellipsis again
Test Steps.Step Expected: Options displayed\n

Test Steps.Step Action: Click "Delete"\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: A pop-up box will be displayed asking the user if they are sure they want to delete the Office\n

Test Steps.Step Action: Click "Ok"
Test Steps.Step Expected: A success notification is displayed and the Office will be removed from the system

Test Steps.Step Action: Find the existing Non-Election-Template Office that is assigned to an Election and click on the "Actions" ellipsis
Test Steps.Step Expected: Options displayed\n

Test Steps.Step Action: Click "Delete"\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: A pop-up box will be displayed asking the user if they are sure they want to delete the Office\n

Test Steps.Step Action: Click "Ok"
Test Steps.Step Expected: A notification saying "Office Name assigned to Election Office Mapping cannot be deleted" and the office will still exist in the system

Test Steps.Step Action: Find the existing Office that is assigned to an Election Template that an Election uses and click on the "Actions" ellipsis\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: Options displayed\n

Test Steps.Step Action: Click "Delete"\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: A pop-up box will be displayed asking the user if they are sure they want to delete the Office\n

Test Steps.Step Action: Click "Ok"\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: A notification saying "Office Name assigned to Election Template cannot be deleted" and the office will still exist in the system\n

Title: EM - Office Holders Search Office Holders - Search page view

Test Steps.Step Expected: \n

Test Steps.Step Action: Log in to the system \n 2. Click on Office in the main menu \n 3. Select Office Holders from the dropdown
Test Steps.Step Expected: The system should navigate to the Office Holders section

Test Steps.Step Action: Navigate to Office Holders section \n 2. Click on an Office Holder's Name \n 3. Click on History
Test Steps.Step Expected: The system should display the history of the selected office holder

Test Steps.Step Action: 1. Navigate to Office Holders - Search page \n 2. Enter search criteria (e.g., name, office, term) \n 3. Click Search
Test Steps.Step Expected: The system should display matching office holders based on the criteria

Test Steps.Step Action: 1. Navigate to Office Holders - Search page \n 2. Ensure all necessary fields (name, office, term, etc.) are displayed \n 3. Verify that the search and reset buttons are available
Test Steps.Step Expected: The system should display all relevant fields and functionalities correctly

Test Steps.Step Action: Office holders search

Title: 71858-Add/Maintain Office - Verify Number of Seats field is non-editable after creation

Test Steps.Step Action: Navigate to EM-> Offices->Search Offices->ADD
Test Steps.Step Expected: Maintain office Page must be displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Verify Number of Seats field is clearly highlighted in Red \n when skipped
Test Steps.Step Expected: Number of Seats field must be mandatory

Test Steps.Step Action: Try to save the record without entering Number of Seats
Test Steps.Step Expected: The system should prevent the user from saving without entering the "Number of Seats" field

Test Steps.Step Action: Enter all the mandatory fields and click "Save"
Test Steps.Step Expected: Office must be saved successfully

Test Steps.Step Action: Navigate to EM-> Offices->Search Offices->Action->Edit mode\nVerify the "Number of Seats" field
Test Steps.Step Expected: Must be disabled and non-editable
